cause.description:
since our seniors of 2007 fucked up and there is no word of a hockey team back at christ the king rhs, this is to help gain our team back. there is no need for the rest of the team who are still in the school to suffer for the graduates doing. so PLEASE BRING KINGS HOCKEY TEAM BACK
1. Christ the King's hockey team must come back!!!
cause.mission: bring christ the kings hockey team back
cause.name: BRiNG CK HOCKEY TEAM BACK!!!
